Manx: God save great George our King,
English: Dy saue Yee George nyn Ree !
Sheer freayll yn noid fo smaght

Manx: Rise up, O Lord our God,
English: Trog ort, O Hiarn nyn Yee !
Shass uss sheer, er nyn jeu,

Manx: Pour down on George in favour,
English: Deayrt neose er George ayns foayr,

Manx: Ever supporting the good of the people,
English: Sheer freayll seose foays y Thea,
As coyrt dooin oyr dy bra

Manx: To say, with heart and mouth,
English: Lesh cree as veeal dy ghra
